data.name: a1
data.value: Profits of your conference will be sent to the Paypal account you have specified. The payment will be made within two days.

data.name: a10
data.value: Yes, all your information stored on our databases are strictly protected. In addition, some sensitive information such as your password are encrypted using mathematical algorithms.

data.name: a11
data.value: A cookie is a small text file stored by your browser, which allows us to retain information between web pages and browsing sessions. Streameus uses severals of cookies. They allow us, for example, to keep you authenticated whenever you change page. Cookies are only text, which is always confidential and in most cases encrypted. Streameus never keep any personal data in a cookie.

data.name: a12
data.value: Following someone allows you to be kept informed of its activities and thus to be notified when this person attended a conference or when it will hold one. Anyone can follow you, however, is up to you to decide what the people who follow you can see. To set your confidentiality parameters simply go to "My Account" → "My confidentiality Settings".

data.name: a13
data.value: Yes, we have created three applications that can be used from Windows Phone, Android and iOS. You can find these applications from the stores of those platforms.

data.name: a2
data.value: There is no limit on earnings. The money raised through your conference depends only on the number of users present in your conference and the price you previously set for it.

data.name: a3
data.value: You can fund your account by visiting the « My Account » space, and filling in your credit card or your Paypal account. Your balance is credited in real time.

data.name: a4
data.value: You can create a Streameus account, or login directly on the website with your Facebook, Twitter or Google Plus account. Registering takes only a few minutes, simply fill out the form that appears after you click the button "Sign me" on the homepage.

data.name: a5
data.value: To recover your password, go to the « login » page then click on the link "Forgot your password" below the login form. After entering your username or your e-mail, you will receive an e-mail stating the procedure to follow in order to change your password.

data.name: a6
data.value: You encounter difficulties, or you have spotted a bug? You can contact us by clicking on the « contact us » link present on the footer of the website.

data.name: a7
data.value: Register, interact with other users and create a conference on Streameus is completely free. Nevertheless, some conferences are not free to attend so you will have to pay the specified price.

data.name: a8
data.value: Streameus is composed of a team of 8 people. The project was born in the Epitech School in Lyon under the Epitech Innovative Projects (EIP). For more information, you can go to the page "About" → "The team".

data.name: a9
data.value: Yes, you can delete your account from in “My Account" → "Delete my account". However, data such conferences may persist because it they are shared with other users.
